original_solution_mapping.L1: In 2 years, my dog will be 4 years old, so my dog is 4 - 2 = <<4-2=2>>2 years old now.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So I am 15 + 2 = <<15+2=17>>17 years old now.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4901.
    Returns: my current age.
    """
    # L1
    dog_age_in_future = 4 # my dog will turn 4 years old
    years_from_now = 2 # Two years from now
    dog_current_age = dog_age_in_future - years_from_now

    # L2
    my_age_when_dog_born = 15 # I was 15 years old
    my_current_age = my_age_when_dog_born + dog_current_age

    # FA
    answer = my_current_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In {years_from_now} years, my dog will be {dog_age_in_future} years old, so my dog is {dog_age_in_future} - {years_from_now} = <<{dog_age_in_future}-{years_from_now}={dog_current_age}>>{dog_current_age} years old now.
So I am {my_age_when_dog_born} + {dog_current_age} = <<{my_age_when_dog_born}+{dog_current_age}={my_current_age}>>{my_current_age} years old now.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In 2 years, my dog will be 4 years old, so my dog is 4 - 2 = <<4-2=2>>2 years old now.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So I am 15 + 4 = <<15+4=19>>19 years old now.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'dog_age_in_future' (value: 4) was used instead of 'dog_current_age' (value: 2).
